titleStmt.title: Oaths appointed to be taken instead of the oaths of allegiance and supremacy and declaration.
Oaths appointed to be taken instead of the oaths of allegiance and supremacy and declaration.
titleStmt.author: Leverett, John.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Oath of allegiance to King William III and opposition to the Pope and declaration of disbelief in Catholic doctrines and practices.
Signed in manuscript: John Leverett, Samuel Layman, Thomas Browne, Jam.s Converse.
This item appears at reels 723:8 and 1356:4.
Wing number E1676 (at reel position 1356:4) cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
